title: Video: Mathieu van der Poel Crashes, Flips Over Bars, DNFs in Mountain Bike Disaster
content:
Two crashes in opening laps mark rough comeback to mountain bike for cobblestone king in road toward Tour de France and MTB worlds.

Read the full article at Video: Mathieu van der Poel Crashes, Flips Over Bars, DNFs in Mountain Bike Disaster on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
